result.eng: They went over to America.
result.ga: Chuaigh siad anonn go Mericeá
result.orig: Chuaigh siad anonn go Mericeá
result.html: Chuaigh siad anonn go MericeáThey went over to America.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ siad anonn go MericeáThey went over to America.

result.eng: In a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ga: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.orig: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid é
result.html: Ar bhealach bhí mé sásta go raibh an cogadh thart cé gur chaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.
result.ponchtml: Ar ḃealaċ ḃí mé sásta go raiḃ an cogaḋ ṫart cé gur ċaill muid éIn a way, I was happy the war was over, even though we lost.

result.eng: The posters are hanging all over the city.
result.ga: Tá na póstaeir ar crochadh ar fud na cathrach
result.orig: Tá na póstaeir ar crochadh ar fud na cathrach
result.html: Tá na póstaeir ar crochadh ar fud na cathrachThe posters are hanging all over the city.
result.ponchtml: Tá na póstaeir ar croċaḋ ar fud na caṫraċThe posters are hanging all over the city.

result.eng: The radio broadcasts all over the country.
result.ga: Craolann an raidió ar fud na tíre
result.orig: Craolann an raidió ar fud na tíre
result.html: Craolann an raidió ar fud na tíreThe radio broadcasts all over the country.
result.ponchtml: Craolann an raidió ar fud na tíreThe radio broadcasts all over the country.

result.eng: It will be over before long.
result.ga: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfad
result.orig: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfad
result.html: Beidh deireadh leis sul i bhfadIt will be over before long.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ deireaḋ leis sul i ḃfadIt will be over before long.

result.eng: I was stooping over my books.
result.ga: Bhí mé cromtha ar mo chuid leabhar
result.orig: Bhí mé cromtha ar mo chuid leabhar
result.html: Bhí mé cromtha ar mo chuid leabharI was stooping over my books.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí mé cromṫa ar mo ċuid leaḃarI was stooping over my books.

result.eng: He was leaning over his desk.
result.ga: Bhí sé cromtha ar a dheasc
result.orig: Bhí sé cromtha ar a dheasc
result.html: Bhí sé cromtha ar a dheascHe was leaning over his desk.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí sé cromṫa ar a ḋeascHe was leaning over his desk.

result.eng: I spent three years over there.
result.ga: Chaith mé trí bliana thall ansin
result.orig: Chaith mé trí bliana thall ansin
result.html: Chaith mé trí bliana thall ansinI spent three years over there.
result.ponchtml: Ċaiṫ mé trí bliana ṫall ansinI spent three years over there.

result.eng: I wen over to London.
result.ga: Chuaigh mé sall go Londain
result.orig: Chuaigh mé sall go Londain
result.html: Chuaigh mé sall go LondainI wen over to London.
result.ponchtml: Ċuaiġ mé sall go LondainI wen over to London.

result.eng: As is usual all over Europe.
result.ga: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpa
result.orig: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpa
result.html: De réir mar is gnách ar fud na hEorpaAs is usual all over Europe.
result.ponchtml: De réir mar is gnáċ ar fud na hEorpaAs is usual all over Europe.

result.eng: He jumped over the wall.
result.ga: Léim sé thar an bhalla
result.orig: Léim sé thar an bhalla
result.html: Léim sé thar an bhallaHe jumped over the wall.
result.ponchtml: Léim sé ṫar an ḃallaHe jumped over the wall.

result.eng: Millions of text messages were sent over Christmas.
result.ga: Seoladh na milliúin teachtaireachtaí téacs ar feadh na Nollag
result.orig: Seoladh na milliúin teachtaireachtaí téacs ar feadh na Nollag
result.html: Seoladh na milliúin teachtaireachtaí téacs ar feadh na NollagMillions of text messages were sent over Christmas.
result.ponchtml: Seolaḋ na milliúin teaċtaireaċtaí téacs ar feaḋ na NollagMillions of text messages were sent over Christmas.

result.eng: She came over for a visit.
result.ga: Tháinig sí anall ar cuairt
result.orig: Tháinig sí anall ar cuairt
result.html: Tháinig sí anall ar cuairtShe came over for a visit.
result.ponchtml: Ṫáinig sí anall ar cuairtShe came over for a visit.

result.eng: The game is over.
result.ga: Tá an cluiche thart
result.orig: Tá an cluiche thart
result.html: Tá an cluiche thartThe game is over.
result.ponchtml: Tá an cluiċe ṫartThe game is over.

result.eng: She is famous all over the world.
result.ga: Tá cáil uirthi ar fud an domhain
result.orig: Tá cáil uirthi ar fud an domhain
result.html: Tá cáil uirthi ar fud an domhainShe is famous all over the world.
result.ponchtml: Tá cáil uirṫi ar fud an doṁainShe is famous all over the world.

result.eng: He is coming over from England.
result.ga: Tá sé ag teacht anall as Sasana
result.orig: Tá sé ag teacht anall as Sasana
result.html: Tá sé ag teacht anall as SasanaHe is coming over from England.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé ag teaċt anall as SasanaHe is coming over from England.

result.eng: Sit down over there.
result.ga: Suigh síos ansin
result.orig: Suigh síos ansin
result.html: Suigh síos ansinSit down over there.
result.ponchtml: Suiġ síos ansinSit down over there.

result.eng: There is a leaflet over there. All the information is in it.
result.ga: Tá bileog ansin Tá an t-eolas ar fad ann
result.orig: Tá bileog ansin Tá an t-eolas ar fad ann
result.html: Tá bileog ansin Tá an t-eolas ar fad annThere is a leaflet over there. All the information is in it.

result.eng: For audiences over 18 years.
result.ga: Do lucht féachana os cionn 18 bliain

result.html: Do lucht féachana os cionn 18 bliainFor audiences over 18 years.
result.ponchtml: Do luċt féaċana os cionn 18 bliainFor audiences over 18 years.

result.eng: I am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.
result.ga: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gaillimh inniu tar éis na hoibre
result.orig: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gaillimh inniu tar éis na hoibre
result.html: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gaillimh inniu tar éis na hoibreI am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.
result.ponchtml: Tá mé ag dul soir go Gailliṁ inniu tar éis na hoibreI am going over [literally, "eastwards"] to Galway today after work.

result.eng: I met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ga: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
result.orig: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thall
result.html: Chas mé le cúpla seanchara as Baile na hAbhann nuair a bhí mé thallI met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.
result.ponchtml: Ċas mé le cúpla seanċara as Baile na hAḃann nuair a ḃí mé ṫallI met a couple of old friends from Baile na hAbhann while I was over there.

result.eng: It's on Friday night, over in the hotel.
result.ga: Beidh sé ar siúl oíche Aoine thiar san óstán
result.orig: Beidh sé ar siúl oíche Aoine thiar san óstán
result.html: Beidh sé ar siúl oíche Aoine thiar san óstánIt's on Friday night, over in the hotel.
result.ponchtml: Beiḋ sé ar siúl oíċe Aoine ṫiar san óstánIt's on Friday night, over in the hotel.

result.eng: If they are strong enough, they will prevail over the system.
result.ga: Má bhíonn siad láidir go leor gheobhaidh siad an bua ar an gcóras
result.orig: Má bhíonn siad láidir go leor gheobhaidh siad an bua ar an gcóras
result.html: Má bhíonn siad láidir go leor gheobhaidh siad an bua ar an gcórasIf they are strong enough, they will prevail over the system.
result.ponchtml: Má ḃíonn siad láidir go leor ġeoḃaiḋ siad an bua ar an gcórasIf they are strong enough, they will prevail over the system.

result.eng: Cavan had an easy victory over the Antrim team.
result.ga: Bhí bua éasca ag an gCabhán ar fhoireann Aontroma
result.orig: Bhí bua éasca ag an gCabhán ar fhoireann Aontroma
result.html: Bhí bua éasca ag an gCabhán ar fhoireann AontromaCavan had an easy victory over the Antrim team.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí bua éasca ag an gCaḃán ar ḟoireann AontromaCavan had an easy victory over the Antrim team.

result.eng: When the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.
result.ga: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlann
result.orig: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlann
result.html: Nuair a bhí an obráid thart tháinig an dochtúir amach as an obrádlannWhen the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.
result.ponchtml: Nuair a ḃí an obráid ṫart ṫáinig an doċtúir amaċ as an obrádlannWhen the operation was over, the doctor came out of the operating theatre.

result.eng: The affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
result.ga: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaine
result.orig: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaine
result.html: Bhí an cás ina phríomhscéal ag na meáin fhadbhunaithe ar feadh breis is seachtaineThe affair was main news in the established media for over a week.
result.ponchtml: Ḃí an cás ina ṗríoṁscéal ag na meáin ḟadḃunaiṫe ar feaḋ breis is seaċtaineThe affair was main news in the established media for over a week.

result.eng: As soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ga: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.orig: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoil
result.html: Aon uair amháin a gheibh duine ciall tá deireadh aige le haoibhneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.
result.ponchtml: Aon uair aṁáin a ġeiḃ duine ciall tá deireaḋ aige le haoiḃneas an tsaoilAs soon as one grows up, the fun is over.

result.eng: It's all over for you.
result.ga: Tá sé uilig thart agatsa
result.orig: Tá sé uilig thart agatsa
result.html: Tá sé uilig thart agatsaIt's all over for you.
result.ponchtml: Tá sé uilig ṫart agatsaIt's all over for you.

result.eng: It would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.
result.ga: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamh
result.orig: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamh
result.html: Bheadh sé uilig thart anois agus bheinn as buaireamhIt would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.
result.ponchtml: Ḃeaḋ sé uilig ṫart anois agus ḃeinn as buaireaṁIt would all be over now and my troubles would be no more.
